title: http server is not reading post body
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Start a very small HTTP server: http://pastie.org/839814
2. Send a POST with data 'curl -X POST http://localhost:9999/echo -d 
"a=hello"

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
I expect "body: a=hello". I see nothing

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
linux/386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
release-12-23
